Do you speak Spanish? Are you interested in Spanish culture? Come join the Spanish Conversation Hour! All levels are welcome!  Meetings are Online via Google Hangouts/Meet: Click on a meeting time below to join the Conversation.  TBD  Have questions? Contact David Abugaber-Bowman . Click here to learn more about our program!      Graduate Programs in Spanish  Learn more about the graduate programs in Hispanic and Italian Studies in the areas of linguistics, teaching, literature, and culture.      Undergraduate programs in Spanish  Find out more about the undergraduate programs in Spanish. The department of Hispanic and Italian Studies offers majors in Spanish, Spanish Economics, and Teaching of Spanish.      Spanish Peer Tutoring Schedule  All sessions are DROP-IN, so just show up whenever our tutors are scheduled!
